argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmsq.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | nmsq.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 3 |  | nmsq.n | |- N = ( norm ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_cphnmfval | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> N = ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> ( N ` A ) = ( ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ` A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = A /\ x = A ) -> ( x ., x ) = ( A ., A ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_anidms | |- ( x = A -> ( x ., x ) = ( A ., A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = A -> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( A ., A ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) = ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( sqrt ` ( A ., A ) ) e. _V |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. V -> ( ( x e. V |-> ( sqrt ` ( x ., x ) ) ) ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A ., A ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A ., A ) ) ) |
